content: SEO Generations Battle at Ning SEO Events By: Rand Fishkin January 26, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin January 26, 2006 SEO Generations Battle at Ning SEO Events The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Snipermilk put together a cool battle system between many well known folks in our sphere (including yours truly). You can also upload your own photos to do battle - I added DazzlinDonna and pitted her against Aaron Wall in a vicious battle that took me almost 3 seconds to decide the outcome ;) It's a fun little piece of bait and it's also a good way to show off one of Ning's functionality pieces. I have a feeling we'll be seeing a lot more stuff at that domain. BTW - I'm top 10 in winners and losers... Does that make me a "well balanced" SEO? Copied! Back to Top
